original_command: Select Win32_NTLogEvent \wevtutil.exe wevtutil.exe qe query-events \wmic.exe wmic.exe ntevent Get-WinEvent get-eventlog Microsoft-Windows-PowerShell Microsoft-Windows-Security-Auditing Microsoft-Windows-TerminalServices-LocalSessionManager Microsoft-Windows-TerminalServices-RemoteConnectionManager Microsoft-Windows-Windows Defender PowerShellCore Security Windows PowerShell -InstanceId 462? .eventid -eq 462? EventIdentifier=?4778? -InstanceId 25 .eventid -eq 25 System[EventID=25] EventCode=?25? EventIdentifier=?25?
